title: Born to build
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Bodybuilding is more than just moving heavy metal.
description: Bodybuilding is more than just moving heavy metal. To Alex it is his life. Fascinated as a child with size and strength and an addiction to Marvel comics Alex finally starting pumping iron at the age of 16 and became hooked. Follow his journey in this humourous comic book style presentation as he lifts those weights and pumps that iron to build the perfect body.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006754; Western stories: expressions for the future. [Vol. 1]; Active; 2005
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
